item.title: Spermine, a highly abundant compound in human semen, restricts the sexual transmission of X4-HIV-1, the variants of #HIV-1 that use the CXCR4 co-receptor to enter target cells, according to a new @ScienceAdvances study. https://t.co/t4nULk7Hqs https://t.co/g8LpI3T3Of
